Question
========

In regression, the adequacy of the model can be determined using using *r*^2^. When the slope parameter is equal to 0, then holds that

Answerlist
----------

* R2 = 0.
* R2 = 0.5.
* R2 = 1.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* R2 = 0.: Correct
* R2 = 0.5.: Incorrect
* R2 = 1.: Incorrect
